page.title: 15FARMING * HEALTH
page.content: {HEALTH} There are no doctors in Firle but if you are very ill a doctor will come to you. The nearest hospital is in Lewes which is 5 miles from Firle. There is a meals on wheels service in the village for elderly people. District nurses and midwives also care for the community. {FARMING} There are lots of farms around Firle. There are few sheep on the Downs now. Wheat, barley and corn are grown on the hill but mostly it is used as grazing land for cows.On the flat land around are more sheep. The farms around Firle hace a lot of machinary-tractors, trailers, combines, seed drills, ploughs and other things. A lot of crops are grown silage, hay, potattoes and other things.
